### Two (2) Six (6) Wheel All-Terrain Vehicles
#### Solicitation Number: 202300670
#### Publication Date: 2022-09-08
#### Tender Closing Date and Time: 2022-10-11T14:00:00

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking proposals for the purchase of two (2) six-wheel all-terrain vehicles. These vehicles will support police operations and border protection.

### Key Requirements

*   The vehicles must be designed and constructed for rugged commercial applications.
*   Each vehicle must be capable of withstanding daily use in adverse weather conditions and over uneven terrain.
*   The vehicles must have the potential to traverse wet, muddy, snowy, and often inclined areas.

### Delivery and Performance

*   The vehicles must be delivered to the RCMP by July 1st, 2023.
*   The period of the contract will commence on the date of contract signing and end on July 15th, 2023.

### Evaluation Criteria and Selection

*   Proposals will be evaluated based on technical requirements.
*   The evaluated proposal with the lowest price will be recommended for contract award.

### Tendering Process

*   Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at:
    *   Procurement and Material Management
    *   Royal Canadian Mounted Police, C Division
    *   4225 Dorchester, Westmount, QC H3Z 1V5
*   Refer to the attached tender documents for further information.
